tool_description: OSM-based basemaps for Leaflet, MapLibre GL, OpenLayers, QGIS, and other libraries and GIS.
name: Maps for app and website
title: Maps for app and website

api_list.name: ZXY Raster Map Tiles
api_list.description:
Vector map tiles to be used in Leaflet, QGIS, and other libraries and GIS.
**IMPORTANT!** Use ZXY format to add a basemap layer. For example,  `v1/tile/dark-matter-purple-roads/{z}/{x}/{y}.png`

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: Supported map style: osm-carto and vector

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tile/osm-carto/0/0/0.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tile/{style}/{z}/{x}/{y_and_format}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vector Map Tiles
api_list.description:
Vector map tiles to be used in MapLibre GL (Mapbox GL), OpenLayers.
**IMPORTANT!** To authorize renderer requests to RapidAPI, you either need to inject "x-rapidapi-key" header into each request issued by renderer OR (easier) add it as the "rapidapi-key" query string parameter.

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: Supported map style: osm-carto, osm-bright, osm-bright-grey, osm-bright-smooth, klokantech-basic, osm-liberty, maptiler-3d, toner, toner-grey, positron, positron-blue, positron-red, dark-matter, dark-matter-brown, dark-matter-dark-grey, dark-matter-dark-purple, dark-matter-purple-roads, dark-matter-yellow-roads

required_parameters.name: resource
required_parameters.description: Style resources, including style.json, tile.json, fonts, sprites and other meta-resources referenced by a map style.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com/v1/styles/osm-carto/style.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com/v1/styles/{style}/{resource}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maps-for-app-and-website.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
